X

xdbException - exception xdb.xdbException.
The general exception class for XML databases.

XML - interface xdb.XML.
The objectifizer of an XML or XML-like document.
xmlDriver - interface xdb.xmlDriver.
The driver interface of the XML database.

Terminology:
client or XDB client - The entity using the XDB driver.
xmlDriverImpl - class xdb.xmlDriverImpl.
This is a full implementation of the XDB driver interface.

For support of different underlying technologies, several packages are needed: com.sun.xml.tree (only if the default documentProxy used): DOM1, XML1, DTD org.w3c.dom: DOM1 com.jclark.xsl.dom: DOM1, XSLT1
xmlDriverImpl() - Constructor for class xdb.xmlDriverImpl
 
XSLT - interface xdb.XSLT.
The objectifizer of an XSLT document.
